ccew.title: Register of charities in England and Wales
ccew.source: Registered charities in England and Wales, Data download service provided by the Charity Commission

top_by_income.title: Largest charities by income
top_by_income.sql:
select c.regno,
c.name, mc.income, mc.incomedate from charity c inner join main_charity mc on c.regno = mc.regno where mc.income is not null order by mc.income desc

charities_by_postcode.title: Select charities in a postcode
charities_by_postcode.sql:
select c.regno,
c.name,
c.postcode,
mc.income,
mc.incomedate
from charity c
inner join main_charity mc on c.regno = mc.regno
where mc.income is not null
and c.postcode like :postcode || '%'
order by mc.income desc
